PSCT.Base: Reveal 1 Normal Monster from your Deck, and 1 Effect Monster from your Deck with the same Type, Attribute, and Level, then your opponent randomly chooses 1 for you to add to your hand, also you shuffle the other into your Deck. You can only activate 1 "Monster Assortment" per turn.
